JobTitle: North America Supply Chain Learning Content Developer
JobFullDesc:
The North America Supply Chain (NASC) Training Content Developer designs and develops learning experiences supporting Nike's supply chain and logistics operations. As a Content Developer, you will:

Work closely with Supply Chain business partners to consult, design and develop highly interactive learning experiences for the NASC leadership onboarding and development program.
Conduct analysis to identify the best knowledge transfer method, determine learning objectives and estimate level of effort to design/develop learning solutions.
Collaborate with other NASC Training Content Developers, business partners, and/or consultants in the creation of learning solutions.
Demonstrate and utilize effective need's analysis, course development, and project management, and evaluation skills.
Utilize a variety of technology and authoring tools, e.g., Microsoft Word, PowerPoint, Adobe Captivate, Camtasia, Wordpress, LearnDash LMS, LiveTiles, etc.
Partner with other team members, as needed, to publish or deliver the final learning solutions.
Adhere to the design and development process including timelines and landmarks, results and target dates.
Provide mentorship and niche knowledge to other members of the team.
Perform other duties as assigned. This Memphis, TN-based position requires a creative individual who is self-driven, results-oriented with a positive outlook, and consistently maintains and advocates for high quality. This person puts a laser-sharp focus on the learning ecosystem needs and strives to understand and address the learner's needs. This team member is a natural planner with outstanding time and project management skills who can critically assess own performance. This person is also reliable, resilient, and able to respond professionally to ambiguity and change. He or she should be a validated and effective communicator, able to see things from multiple points of view. The Content Developer demonstrates daily, the Power of Team, building relationships throughout the business partners they support and always looks to give to the success of the NASC Training and Development Team.
